title: How many potatoes can you eat in a day? - Quora

response.answer_text: You have heard of hot dog eating contests and pie eating and so on where it is more a question of stuffing it in your face. Well, it isn’t any different with potatoes. If you are silly enough to abuse your digestive system in that manner you deserve the consequences. But you will be hard put to find a potato eating contest where you might win anything for your effort. Healthy eating is a matter of quality before quantity. Eat only the most nutritious food you can find and afford and only enough to get to the next meal where there are days instead of hours between them and you will be healthier and save time and money.

Well, about the potato, its a starchy vegetable and kind of low calories and a complex carb, and can be really healthy. But, regarding your question ONE or TWO is enough for a day. Because you need to eat other vegetables and starches to maximize the health benefits.
